title: Deadlift Technique Observation
excerpt: Noticed someone rounding their back while deadlifting. A quick cue: brace your core and keep your chest up.

title: Family and Fitness
excerpt: Making time for fitness as a student with a busy family schedule isn’t easy, but it’s essential.

title: High-Protein Stir-Fry Idea
excerpt: Thinking of a stir-fry with chicken breast, broccoli, and shirataki noodles. High volume, low calorie.

title: Posture Tip: Desk Work
excerpt: Spent 4 hours studying today. Remember: your head weighs ~5kg. Keep it aligned with your spine to avoid strain.

title: Protein Pancakes for Breakfast
excerpt: Recipe idea: oat flour, egg whites, whey protein, and cinnamon. Sweet, filling, and under 300 calories.

title: The Power of Rest
excerpt: Rest is as important as your workouts. Soreness isn’t a badge of honor; it’s a sign to recover properly.

title: Foam Rolling Routine
excerpt: Filmed a quick foam rolling routine for tight hamstrings. Keep it slow and controlled for best results.

title: Progress Is Personal
excerpt: Progress looks different for everyone. Don’t compare your chapter 1 to someone else’s chapter 10.

title: Proper Lifting Warm-Up
excerpt: Always warm up before lifting. Think dynamic stretches: lunges, arm swings, and hip openers.

title: Mindful Eating Habits
excerpt: Had a moment of mindless snacking today. Reminder: eat without distractions, savor your food, and listen to your body.

title: Weekend Gym Vibes
excerpt: Shot a quick video of my favorite exercises from today’s workout: deadlifts, chin-ups, and sled pushes.

title: Foam Rolling for Calves
excerpt: Quick tip: when foam rolling calves, focus on slow, controlled movements. Stop on tight spots and breathe.

title: Low-Calorie Protein Mug Cake
excerpt: Wrote down a protein mug cake recipe: whey protein, cocoa powder, almond milk, and a bit of stevia.

title: The Importance of Mobility
excerpt: Mobility isn’t flexibility. It’s strength in motion. Work on it to prevent injuries and improve movement quality.

title: Shoulder Warm-Up Routine
excerpt: Filmed a warm-up for shoulder health: band pull-aparts, shoulder taps, and external rotations.
